mapper.select: select a.* from ma_wf_event a order by wffk, SCRIPTTYPE, DATASEQ
select a.* from ma_wf_event a where guid=#GUID#
mapper.insert:
insert into ma_wf_event ( guid, WFFK, SCRIPTTYPE, EVENTNAME, DESCRIPTION, EVENTTYPE, RUNAT, SCRIPT, TITLE, FEEDBACK, UI, MESSAGEICON, ISFIXED, FIXEDMESSAGE, PARENTGUID, DATASEQ,
FULLNAME, FILENAME, ICONPATH,
createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid ) values ( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #WFFK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SCRIPTTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #EVENTNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #EVENTTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #RUNAT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SCRIPT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FEEDBACK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #UI:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MESSAGEICON:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISFIXED:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIXEDMESSAGE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PARENTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#,
#FULLNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FILENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ICONPATH:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
update ma_wf_event
UPDATETIME=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATEUSERGUID=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, WFFK=#WFFK#, SCRIPTTYPE=#SCRIPTTYPE#, EVENTNAME=#EVENTNAME#, DESCRIPTION=#DESCRIPTION#, EVENTTYPE=#EVENTTYPE#, RUNAT=#RUNAT#, SCRIPT=#SCRIPT#, TITLE=#TITLE#, FEEDBACK=#FEEDBACK#, UI=#UI#, MESSAGEICON=#MESSAGEICON#, ISFIXED=#ISFIXED#, FIXEDMESSAGE=#FIXEDMESSAGE#, PARENTGUID=#PARENTGUID#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#, FULLNAME=#FULLNAME#, FILENAME=#FILENAME#, ICONPATH=#ICONPATH#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
